mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(COMT_SEQ) FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_COMT WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT A.*, B.*, C.* FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_IMAGE B ON PROJ_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_FILE C ON PROJ_SEQ = C.BOARD_SEQ WHERE PROJ_SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT A.* FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT A WHERE PROJ_SEQ > #{seq} ORDER BY PROJ_SEQ ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT A.* FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT A WHERE PROJ_SEQ < #{seq} ORDER BY PROJ_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT (PROJ_TITLE, PROJ_SUBTITLE, PROJ_DESC, PROJ_CONTENTS, PROJ_THUMB, PROJ_SOURCECD, PROJ_DEVELOPER, PROJ_HITS, PROJ_ENABLED) VALUES (#{title}, #{subtitle}, #{desc}, #{contents}, #{thumbnail}, #{sourcecode},#{developer}, #{hits}, #{enabled})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT SET PROJ_TITLE = #{title}, PROJ_SUBTITLE = #{subtitle}, PROJ_DESC = #{desc}, PROJ_CONTENTS = #{contents}, PROJ_THUMB = #{thumbnail}, PROJ_SOURCECD = #{sourcecode}, PROJ_DEVELOPER = #{developer}, PROJ_HITS = #{hits}, PROJ_ENABLED = #{enabled} WHERE PROJ_SEQ = #{seq}
